events.message: I recently received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible for this mistake.
The customer's request involves receiving an incorrect item and asking for a refund, which classifies the issue under 'Refund'.
Assigning this refund-related case to agent Sarah J. for further assistance and resolution.
Hello, I’m Sarah from customer support. I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help you get this sorted out quickly.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received along with your order number so I can verify the issue and process your refund?
Here is a photo of the product I got, which is different from what I ordered. My order number is 123456789. Please advise on the refund process.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated your refund, which should be credited within 5-7 business days. You do not need to return the incorrect item.
Thanks for your swift response and for not making me return the wrong item. I appreciate your help resolving this quickly.
The refund has been processed successfully on our end. Please allow a few days for it to appear in your account.
Just checking in to see if you have received your refund and if everything is now satisfactory with your order experience.
Since the refund has been confirmed and you have no further concerns, I am closing this case. Thank you for contacting customer support.
